sentences.english: L-histidine is an alkalescence amino acid with an imidazole group.
sentences.chinese: 組氨酸是含咪唑核的鹼性氨基酸。

sentences.english: Benzimidazolium salt as a new tetrahydrofolate coenzyme model was introduced.
sentences.chinese: 苯並咪唑鹽是本課題組提出的四氫葉酸輔酶的新模型。

sentences.english: Why can the content of mebendazole of this compound tablet be assayed by the spectrophotometric method?
sentences.chinese: 本品中甲苯咪唑的含量爲什麼可以用分光光度法測定？

sentences.english: Imazamox is an imidazolinone compound. It is a high-effective post-emergence herbicide used in upland field.
sentences.chinese: 甲氧咪草煙爲咪唑啉酮類高效旱田苗後除草劑。

sentences.english: Crystals of a benzimidazole derivative which are useful as a therapeutic agent.
sentences.chinese: 用作治療劑的苯並咪唑衍生物的晶體。

sentences.english: Those allergic to corticoid and imidazole medicament are forbidden to use.
sentences.chinese: 對皮質激素類藥物及咪唑類藥物過敏者禁用。

sentences.english: In addition, sulfhydryl or imidazole group might be the active center of the enzyme.
sentences.chinese: 酶的活性中心含有巰基或咪唑基。

sentences.english: Pigment Yellow 214, based on bis-benzimidazolone azo pigment.
sentences.chinese: 顏料黃214爲代表的雙苯並咪唑酮偶氮顏料。

sentences.english: This paper reviews the current status and future of the imidazolinone herbicide-resistant crops.
sentences.chinese: 本文詳述了咪唑啉酮抗性作物的現狀及其發展。

sentences.english: Conclusion Methimazole is the first choice for the treatment of hyperthyroidism disease.
sentences.chinese: 結論門診治療甲狀腺功能亢進症，甲巰咪唑爲首選。

sentences.english: The imidazoline was synthesized from black acid liquid.
sentences.chinese: 以酸性黑油爲原料合成咪唑啉。

sentences.english: The polymeric fibers may include poly diimidazo pyridinylene fibers.
sentences.chinese: 聚合物纖維可包括聚二咪唑並亞吡啶基纖維。

sentences.english: Objective To observe the effect of mebendazole against adult worm of Angiostrongylus cantonensis.
sentences.chinese: 目的觀察甲苯咪唑對廣州管圓線蟲成蟲的殺滅效果。

sentences.english: Rosickyite-Benzimidazole and novantisol were ideal anthelmintic.
sentences.chinese: 理想的驅蟲藥物有丙硫苯咪唑和左咪唑。

sentences.chinese: 理想的驅蟲藥物有丙硫苯咪唑和左咪唑。

sentences.english: The mechanism of hexa- coordinate phosphorus intermediate explains the catalytic effect of imidazole.
sentences.chinese: 六配位磷機理比較好地解釋了咪唑的催化作用。
